titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn tax document collection 1986.012
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-08-08 13:53:33 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: This small artifical collection contains four documents relating to Brooklyn taxes and tax collections and dated 1864-1909.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder with no particular arrangement.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn tax document collection, 1986.012; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains documents relating to Brooklyn taxes and tax collections, including: a tax form for a property transaction on Van Brunt St by W. A. Husted, dated 1864; a tax form for a property transaction on Lawton St. by William Radde, dated 1865; a receipt for A.S. Wheeler for taxes paid on a property transaction, dated 1866; and a petition and an affadavit concerning John B. France's attempt to receive a tax refund, dated 1909.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials in this collection are in the public domain.
